genresAdvancedInfo.name: kritika
genresAdvancedInfo.description: A genre of music that originated in India and is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the sitar, tabla, and harmonium. Kritika is often associated with devotional music and is used in religious ceremonies and festivals. The genre has a rich history and is still popular today, with many contemporary artists incorporating elements of kritika into their music.
